thread.title: Excellent stay with 5 star service.
thread.title_full: Excellent stay with 5 star service. - Review of St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Frank B
title: Excellent stay with 5 star service.
text:
When we (frequently) visit India, we usually stay in Taj hotels which are always in great locations and offer excellent service with every amenity. St James's Court in central London is no exception and we thoroughly enjoyed our Taj experience there. The Reception, Concierge and Bar staff were most helpful and we were delighted to meet the charming Hotel Manager, Gagan Sharma.
Room Tip: All rooms appear to be quiet. Select the level of amenity according to the terms and price available... See more room tips
